alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 9:37PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1030 PM MST... At 936 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms across the north Valley, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Peoria, Surprise, El Mirage, Fountain Hills, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Sun City, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Deer Valley Airport, Downtown Peoria, Surprise Stadium, Arrowhead Mall, Desert Mountain and McDowell Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 214 and 230. US Highway 60 between mile markers 133 and 150. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 10 and 24, and between mile markers 36 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
